author: Geoffrey A. Fowler, Heather Kelly, Reed Albergotti
title: Social distancing works. The earlier the better, California and Washington data show. - Washington Post
description: Social distancing works. The earlier the better, California and Washington data show. Washington Post San Francisco Bay Area is tightening shelter-in-place restrictions - Business Insider Business Insider Tale of two cities: How San Francisco is flattening th…
content:
SAN FRANCISCO Mandatory social distancing works. The earlier the better, preliminary data from two weeks of stay-at-home orders in California and Washington show.
Those states were the first to report community cases of covid-19 and also the first in the nat… [+13608 chars]
